name: explicably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be explained: He explicably delayed the decision as long as he could. She was explicably amazed going through all these details. See
explicable
More examplesFewer examplesThere are some features of the system that are odd, but explicably so.They invited some complete strangers and, more explicably, some of their neighbours. He crossed the finish line explicably wreathed in smiles.
